data.text: @beyouonlybetter Has the WHO or CNN checked our southern border lately?

@beyouonlybetter The WHO should be dissolved. We need health organizations not hate organizations. Though they might be better than the CDC, FDA or NIH so I guess bad can get worse. But what is worse than an org that create mass suffering?
@beyouonlybetter This is just the precursor to the latest strain which will be coming from Eastern Europe so once this BS is over they can pivot back to Covid for the Summer again.
